name: Audiobookshelf
description: Audiobookshelf is a self-hosted audiobook server for managing and playing your audiobooks. Audiobookshelf has a clean, accessible design that's loaded with features but not overly complicated.
longDescription: Audiobookshelf is a self-hosted audiobook server for managing and playing your audiobooks. Audiobookshelf has a clean, accessible design that's loaded with features but not overly complicated.
